channel.title: CVE Feed for Patrick Posner -- Simply Static
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Patrick Posner -- Simply Static

item.title: CVE-2024-32825|2024-04-24T07:37:58.648Z -- Patrick Posner -- Simply Static
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability in Patrick Posner Simply Static.This issue affects Simply Static: from n/a through 3.1.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-30178|2024-03-27T10:25:29.714Z -- Patrick Posner -- Simply Static
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Patrick Posner Simply Static allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Simply Static: from n/a through 3.1.3.
